TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_demiad, title = demiad, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/demiad} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:日子,白天,白晝,氣候) misakakawaw kaku tu demiad. 我白天去上班.
(kamo no holam:日子,白天,白晝,氣候) misakakawaw kako to demiad. 我白天去上班.
